	Appeared in 33 games and made two starts ... Averaged 3.3 ppg, 5.0 rpg and 1.3 apg.

5 Barry Evans

Height 6-8

Hometown Baltimore, Md.

High School Baltimore Poly

Position F

Instagram

Bio

Related

Stats

Biography

2023-24 (Sophomore at St. Bonaventure)

Appeared in 33 games and made two starts ... Averaged 3.3 ppg, 5.0 rpg and 1.3 apg.

Shot 59 percent from the field.

Collected a season high 10 rebounds vs Niagara and Akron.

Recorded six points and nine rebounds on the road at George Mason.

Scored a season-high nine points in final regular season game vs Saint Louis.

7 points and 7 rebounds in A-10 Tournament vs eventual champion Duquesne.

2022-23 (Freshman at St. Bonaventure)

Played in all 32 games including 21 starts, averaging 3.0 points and 3.6 rebounds in 18.5 minutes per contest

Scored season-best 12 points vs. Saint Francis (PA), going 6-of-9 from the floor with eight rebounds (11/7)

Finished with 10 points and tied a career-best of nine rebounds in a win vs. Cleveland State (12/7)

Hauled in nine rebounds and scored seven points at Loyola Chicago (1/21)

Played the full 40 minutes with six points in a win over Southern Indiana (11/22)

High School / Prep

Helped key a national prep championship with Putnam Science Academy, ranking third on the team in total points, first in rebounds, third in assists and third in steals

Averaged 10.9 points, 6.7 rebounds, 2.9 assists and 1.6 steals for the Mustangs

Shot nearly 51 percent from the floor and started all 37 games

Became just the second player in PSA history to record a triple-double when he posted 17 points, 21 rebounds and 10 assists in a win over Commonwealth Academy

Preserved PSA's undefeated record with a putback with one second remaining vs. Brewster, sending the game to overtime where the Mustangs would prevail

Led team in scoring four times, in rebounding 10 times and assists six times

Played high school at Oakland Mills and Baltimore Poly in the Baltimore area

Earned a spot on the Baltimore Sun All-County First Team in 2020 before the following season's Baltimore City Public School campaign was wiped out due to the pandemic

Previously earned All-District First Team honors as a junior at Oakland Mills, helping his squad to the state playoffs
